original_text: Before he chose me, I said bad things about him. I caused great trouble for his people. I was a cruel man, but God was very kind to me. He forgave me because I did not know what I was doing. That was because I did not believe in Jesus.
korean_text: 내가 전에는 비방자요 박해자요 폭행자였으나 도리어 긍휼을 입은 것은 내가 믿지 아니할 때에 알지 못하고 행하였음이라

sentences.original_text: I said bad things about him
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그에 대해 나쁜 말을 했습니다

sentences.original_text: I caused great trouble for his people
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그의 백성에게 큰 고통을 주었습니다

sentences.original_text: but God was very kind to me
because I did not know what I was doing
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 무엇을 하고 있는지 몰랐기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: I did not believe in Jesus
